client_sql_auth: select pe_id,pe_hash,pe_sts,pe_fname,pe_lname,PE_LL_Tstmp,PE_Email,C.C_ID,C.C_Name,C_ATstmp,0 INV_OVERDUE from jsharmony.CPE inner join C on C.C_ID = CPE.C_ID inner join UCOD_C_STS on UCOD_C_STS.CODEVAL=C.C_STS and UCOD_C_STS.CODECODE='A' where lower(PE_Email)=lower(@pe_email);

select cper.cr_name as sr_name from jsharmony.CR inner join jsharmony.CPER on CPER.CR_Name=CR.CR_Name inner join jsharmony.CPE on CPE.PE_ID=CPER.PE_ID where CR_STS='ACTIVE' and lower(PE_Email)=lower(@pe_email) and PE_STS='ACTIVE';
client_sql_login: select pe_id,pe_hash,pe_sts from jsharmony.CPE where lower(PE_Email)=lower(@pe_email)
client_sql_superlogin: select PE.pe_id,pe_hash from jsharmony.PE inner join jsharmony.SPER on SPER.PE_ID = PE.PE_ID and SPER.SR_Name='SYSADMIN' where PE_STS='ACTIVE' and lower(PE_Email)=lower(@pe_email)
client_sql_loginsuccess: update jsharmony.CPE set PE_LL_IP=@pe_ll_ip,PE_LL_Tstmp=@pe_ll_tstmp where PE_ID=@pe_id; select changes() xrowcount;
client_sql_passwordreset: update jsharmony.CPE set PE_HASH=@pe_hash,PE_LL_Tstmp=@pe_ll_tstmp where PE_ID=@pe_id; select changes() xrowcount;
admin_sql_auth: select sper.sr_name from jsharmony.SR inner join jsharmony.SPER on SPER.SR_Name=SR.SR_Name inner join jsharmony.PE on PE.PE_ID=SPER.PE_ID where SR_STS='ACTIVE' and lower(PE_Email)=lower(@pe_email) and PE_STS='ACTIVE';
admin_sql_login: select pe_id,pe_hash,pe_sts from jsharmony.PE where lower(PE_Email)=lower(@pe_email)
admin_sql_superlogin: select PE.pe_id,pe_hash from jsharmony.PE inner join jsharmony.SPER on SPER.PE_ID = PE.PE_ID and SPER.SR_Name='SYSADMIN' where PE_STS='ACTIVE' and lower(PE_Email)=lower(@pe_email)
admin_sql_loginsuccess: update jsharmony.PE set PE_LL_IP=@pe_ll_ip,PE_LL_Tstmp=@pe_ll_tstmp where PE_ID=@pe_id; select changes() xrowcount;
admin_sql_passwordreset: update jsharmony.PE set PE_HASH=@pe_hash,PE_LL_IP=@pe_ll_ip,PE_LL_Tstmp=@pe_ll_tstmp where PE_ID=@pe_id; select changes() xrowcount;
admin_sql_check_email: select PE_Email from jsharmony.PE where PE_ID=@pe_id
